original: @344b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @344b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: n'i l'amba ra badzra dha ra badzra p'a ni ro sha s'a dha nam /
analyzed: n'i l'amba ra badzra dha ra badzra p'a ni ro sha s'a dha nam /
translated: Nilambaravajradhara-vajrapāṇi-roṣasādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gtum po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gtum po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
translated: Phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gtum po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to noble Mañjuśrī.

original: g-yon brkyang pa yi gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: g-yon brkyang pa yi gdan la bzhugs //
translated: Seated on a seat with the left leg extended,

original: rdo rje bsnams shing klu rnams 'dul //
analyzed: rdo rje bsnams shing klu rnams 'dul //
translated: Holding a vajra, taming the nāgas,

original: rgyal ldan khro bo'i rgyal la 'dud //
analyzed: rgyal ldan khro bo'i rgyal la 'dud //
translated: I bow to the king of wrathful ones.

original: ji ltar rtog pa rgyud nas bri //
analyzed: ji ltar rtog pa rgyud nas bri //
translated: As it is described in the tantra,🔽The practitioner with compassion, wisdom, faith,

original: snying brtse shes rab dad dang // dbang dang rjes gnang sgrub pa pos //
analyzed: snying brtse shes rab dad dang // dbang dang rjes gnang sgrub pa pos //
translated: Empowerment, and permission,

original: gnas khang me tog gcal bkram nas //
analyzed: gnas khang me tog gcal bkram nas //
translated: Having strewn a flower carpet in the dwelling place,

original: bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste //
analyzed: bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste //
translated: Seated on a comfortable seat,

original: rje btsun la sogs spyan drangs nas //
analyzed: rje btsun la sogs spyan drangs nas //
translated: Having invited the venerable ones and so forth,

original: mchod cing bshags pa la sogs bya //
analyzed: mchod cing bshags pa la sogs bya //
translated: Making offerings, confessing, and so on,

original: aom sh'un+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konya\ham /
analyzed: aom sh'un+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konya\ham /
translated: Oṃ śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako 'ham.

original: de nas rang sems h'um du bsams //
analyzed: de nas rang sems h'um du bsams //
translated: Then, one's mind is visualized as hūṃ,

original: 'od 'phros gyur dang sa gzhir bsams //
analyzed: 'od 'phros gyur dang sa gzhir bsams //
translated: Radiating light and imagining the ground,

original: de nas h'um las gzhal yas ni //
analyzed: de nas h'um las gzhal yas ni //
translated: Then, from the hūṃ, the celestial mansion

original: rdo rje sngon po lte bar bcas //
analyzed: rdo rje sngon po lte bar bcas //
translated: is a blue vajra with a hub,

original: gru bzhi sgo bzhi zla ba'i gdan //
analyzed: gru bzhi sgo bzhi zla ba'i gdan //
translated: with four corners, four doors, and moon seats.

original: h'um las rdo rje sku bskyed de //
analyzed: h'um las rdo rje sku bskyed de //
translated: From the hūṃ, generate the vajra body,

original: brkyang bskum ljang nag rdo rje g-yas //
analyzed: brkyang bskum ljang nag rdo rje g-yas //
translated: green-black, with left leg extended and right leg drawn in, holding a vajra in the right hand

original: sbrul dang stag lpags sdig pa g-yon //
analyzed: sbrul dang stag lpags sdig pa g-yon //
translated: and a snake, tiger-skin skirt, and scorpion in the left.

original: khro bo'i zhal mdog thugs kar h'um //
analyzed: khro bo'i zhal mdog thugs kar h'um //
translated: The face is wrathful, with hūṃ at the heart.

original: de las khro bo bzhi po 'phros //
analyzed: de las khro bo bzhi po 'phros //
translated: From that, the four wrathful ones emanate:🔽Trāṭ, Trāṭ, Trāṭ, Trāṭ,

original: khams gsum rgyal dang shin tu khros //
analyzed: khams gsum rgyal dang shin tu khros //
translated: the conqueror of the three worlds, and the very wrathful

original: rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil //
translated: Vajra-heruka Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: sgo bzhi dag tu bsam par bya //
analyzed: sgo bzhi dag tu bsam par bya //
translated: They are visualized at the four doors.

original: sku mdog ljang nag phur bu bsnams //
analyzed: sku mdog ljang nag phur bu bsnams //
translated: Green-black in color, they hold daggers

original: zla ba'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs //
analyzed: zla ba'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs //
translated: and stand with left leg extended on moon seats.

original: ye shes la sogs spyan drangs bstim //
analyzed: ye shes la sogs spyan drangs bstim //
translated: Invite the awareness beings and absorb them.

original: sku gsung byin brlab gnas drug bsrung /
analyzed: sku gsung byin brlab gnas drug bsrung /
translated: Bless the body, speech, and mind, and protect the six places.

original: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
analyzed: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
translated: oṃ caṇḍa-mahā-roṣaṇa hūṃ phaṭ

original: pra dzny'anta kri ta k'i li k'i l'a ya h'um phat /
analyzed: pra dzny'anta kri ta k'i li k'i l'a ya h'um phat /
translated: prajñā-anta-kṛta kīlāya hūṃ phaṭ

original: tsu tu tsu ru tsanda k'i l'i k'i l'a ya phat /
analyzed: tsu tu tsu ru tsanda k'i l'i k'i l'a ya phat /
translated: cuṭu cuṭu caṇḍa kīlāya kīlāya phaṭ

original: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya phat /
analyzed: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya phat /
translated: trasayatra­sayavajra kīlāya phat

original: na ma:tsanda aa mo gha k'e l'a ya phat ces bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: na ma:tsanda aa mo gha k'e l'a ya phat ces bzlas par bya'o //
translated: namaḥ caṇḍāmogha kīlāya phat.

original: gtor ma ni aom h'um hr'i:zhes pas byin gyis brlab bo //
analyzed: gtor ma ni aom h'um hr'i:zhes pas byin gyis brlab bo //
translated: The bali offering is consecrated with oṃ hūṃ hriḥ.

original: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis @345a * //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis @345a * //
translated: With the root mantra,

original: dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbul bar bya'o //
translated: it is offered.

original: dam pa'i byin rlabs phan pa chen po thob //
analyzed: dam pa'i byin rlabs phan pa chen po thob //
translated: The great benefit of the blessing of the holy

original: 'bras bu nye ba nyid du 'grub 'gyur te //
analyzed: 'bras bu nye ba nyid du 'grub 'gyur te //
translated: will be accomplished in a short time.

original: dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi 'di //
analyzed: dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi 'di //
translated: This nectar of the mouth of the glorious guru

original: bdag gis 'thungs nas gzhan la phan phyir brtsams //
analyzed: bdag gis 'thungs nas gzhan la phan phyir brtsams //
translated: I have drunk and composed for the benefit of others.

original: bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di byas pas //
analyzed: bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di byas pas //
translated: By my having made this sādhana,

original: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams //
analyzed: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams //
translated: may I and infinite sentient beings

original: bar chad thams cad rab zhi ste //
analyzed: bar chad thams cad rab zhi ste //
translated: completely pacify all obstacles🔽and become like Vajrapāṇi.

original: phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar shog / phyag na rdo rje gtum po'i sgrub thabs ao dyan gyi slob dpon aa mo pa na dha zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar shog / phyag na rdo rje gtum po'i sgrub thabs ao dyan gyi slob dpon aa mo pa na dha zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The sādhana of Caṇḍa-Vajrapāṇi composed by the master Amoghavajra of Oḍḍiyāna is complete.

original: // / pandi ta de pa purna m'a ti dang / lo ts'a ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta de pa purna m'a ti dang / lo ts'a ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
translated: The pandita Devapurnanati and the translator Chokyi Zangpo translated this.
